heading: Tonight
text: Snow showers spreading east, becoming moderate at times. Accumulations of 1 to 4 inches expected, with higher totals possible over the Greens. Lows from near 10 into the teens, a few single digits in the north. Wind diminishing to light.

heading: Saturday
text: Periods of snow showers becoming more scattered in the afternoon. Highs from near 10 into the teens, nearing 20 in the valleys, dropping quickly into the single digits by the afternoon. Northwest wind becoming 10 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 25 mph.

heading: Saturday Night
text: Mostly cloudy, with partial clearing in the Champlain and southern valleys. Lows 5 to 15 below zero, colder spots near 20 below. Northwest wind 10 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 25 mph.
